actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 94-1349.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the excise tax imposed on trailers any trailer designed to be used with a light-duty vehicle for farming purposes or for transporting horses or livestock.

summary.text: Exempts from the excise tax on trailers provisions of the Internal Revenue Code, any trailer or semitrailer, and chassis or body for any trailer or semitrailer, or any part or accessory suitable for use in connection with such trailer, which is suitable for use with a vehicle having a gross weight of 10,000 pounds or less and is designed for farming purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the excise tax imposed on trailers any trailer designed to be used with a light-duty vehicle for farming purposes or for transporting horses or livestock.
